channel.title: What do you want out of this forum?
channel.description: Hey all, BobTheGUYYYYY here. I’ve been watching this forum for a while, and... you know. It’s kind of dying. I don’t like to see that, that makes me sad. So I wanted to ask, what are you guys looking for in an Auxy community? How can we pull this place back out of the shadows into the glory it held a couple years ago? Is it collabs, or contests, or fun questions, or just sharing? Whatever I can do to help bring this place back, I’ll give it a shot.

item.title: What do you want out of this forum?

item.description:
Hey all, BobTheGUYYYYY here.
I’ve been watching this forum for a while, and… you know. It’s kind of dying. I don’t like to see that, that makes me sad.
So I wanted to ask, what are you guys looking for in an Auxy community? How can we pull this place back out of the shadows into the glory it held a couple years ago? Is it collabs, or contests, or fun questions, or just sharing?
Whatever I can do to help bring this place back, I’ll give it a shot.
